il.ac.hit.couponstorem.model

Interface IUserDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDao

    public interface IUserDao
    The IUserDao Interface specifies the method used for interacting with a Data Base . the Interface requires a Data Access Object Class that implements those methods. The methods in this class can get , add ,update or delete a row or a column value from the users table in the Data Base.
    Author:
    nadav
